sprint_goal: Establish foundational networking, database infrastructure, and CI pipeline to enable initial service development.
Provision the EKS compute platform and automate continuous deployment, enabling the first microservice to be deployed to staging.
Develop and deploy the core Identity & Access service, enabling user registration and login. Set up the observability stack.
Implement core e-commerce functionality: catalog management for vendors and cart management for customers, built upon a robust order state machine.
Implement high-value, complex features: bulk product import for vendors and the resilient checkout saga for customers.
